original_text: He did not weaken in faith when he considered his own body, which was as good as dead (since he was about a hundred years old), or when he considered the barrenness of Sarah's womb.
korean_text: 그가 백 세나 되어 자기 몸이 죽은 것 같고 사라의 태가 죽은 것 같음을 알고도 믿음이 약하여지지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: He did not weaken in faith
when he considered his own body
which was as good as dead
since he was about a hundred years old
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 약 백 세쯤 되었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: or when he considered the barrenness of Sarah's womb
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 사라의 자궁의 불임을 생각할 때
